title: Piccolo, saxo and company
creator_credit: Jan Coolen, Joop Geesink's Dollywood Productions and Philips and Company
brief_description: How the symphony orchestra was born. The string family of musical instruments met the brass family, and the woodwind family. They were joined by the family of drums and percussion, and eventually the Grand Piano completed the orchestra.
creator_credit_for_label: Jan Coolen, Joop Geesink’s Dollywood Productions and Philips and Company
description: How the symphony orchestra was born. The string family of musical instruments met the brass family, and the woodwind family. They were joined by the family of drums and percussion, and eventually the Grand Piano completed the orchestra.
